section.name: Maven 2 Goals
section.p: The following Maven 2 commands can be used to build validator:

ul.li: mvn test - compile and run the unit tests
mvn install - build the jar and install in local maven repository
mvn site assembly:assembly - Create the source and binary distributions

section.name: Maven 1 Goals
section.p: To build a jar file, change into IO's root directory and run "maven jar". The result will be in the "target" subdirectory.
To build the Javadocs, run "maven javadoc". The result will be in "target/docs/apidocs".
To build the full website, run "maven site". The result will be in "target/docs". You must be online and using JDK 1.4 or higher to successfully complete this target.
Further details can be found in the commons build instructions.

section.name: Ant Goals
section.p: To build a jar file, change into IO's root directory and run "ant jar". The result will be in the "build" subdirectory.
To build the Javadocs, run "ant javadoc". The result will be in "build/dist-build".
